name: LaroTayo!
description:
LaroTayo! is a VR Party Game where you play traditional filipino games with a modern twist. It can be played from 2 to 5 players

Laro Tayo's Games:

Tamaang Tao - A mix of Tamaang Tao and Langit lupa, where the VR player throws balls to stun the other players, while the PC players avoids falling off the platforms

Bring Me - A mix of Limbo Rock and Bring Me, where the VR player will be given a set of descriptions and he would deliver the item from his right to left and the PC Players would bring the bar lower and faster till the VR player can't dodge it anymore 

Hephep Horray - A classic game of Hephep Horray with a few tweaks, Super Hephep and Super horray where the players spam the corresponding button and the lowest one would be deducted a life point. The VR player would be the one holding the mic and the PC players would perform the Hephep and Horrays.

Note:

This game was made by Team Tr0jan in 3 months for our Capstone/Thesis project.

Made with Unity and SteamVR. Tested with HTC Vive, We haven't tested its compatibility with other headsets.
